trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja needs help assembling ingredients for an experiment.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Jayunja)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Jayunja)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Cenote Jayunja)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>We recently received a request from Anggir for samples of the vegetation here. Apparently, she's keen to know what effect they have, if any, on our crops.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>Anggir's tests on the crops are going well, but she has need for more materials if you'd be willing to lend a hand.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>Plants with a unique aetheric signature such as those in Cenote Jayunja would likely make for the best candidates.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_004<tab>The moss-covered rocks there would almost certainly be a boon to her work. Might you be willing to go and collect a few samples?
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>A sampling of the foliage there would almost certainly be a boon to her work. Might you be willing to go and collect some?

TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>A sampling of the algae there would almost certainly be a boon to her work. Might you be willing to go and collect some? Golden stonefly nymphs are said to be drawn to the stuff, so they may help you find what we require.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Anggir would be ever so grateful for any moss-covered rock samples you can find.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>Anggir would be ever so grateful for any promising foliage samples you can find.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>Anggir would be ever so grateful for any algae samples you can find.
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_020<tab>So, were you able to find anything promising?
TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_021<tab>My, what a fine specimen. Anggir will be thrilled!

TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_022<tab>Someday soon, we hope to fully understand the power of the meteorite that invigorates the trees of living light, and this research is a most important first step.

TEXT_BANMAM103_05263_KAGEELJA_000_023<tab>Imagine the possibilities─we would be able to choose varieties of crops better suited to the land, or perhaps even create altogether new ones! I can hardly wait to see how her work bears fruit.
